thread.title: SHOCKING: Duncan suspects foul play in Otumfuo Cup loss to AshantiGold
thread.title_full: SHOCKING: Duncan suspects foul play in Otumfuo Cup loss to AshantiGold

title: SHOCKING: Duncan suspects foul play in Otumfuo Cup loss to AshantiGold
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 19:40 CET SHOCKING: Duncan suspects foul play in Otumfuo Cup loss to AshantiGold - www.ghanasoccernet.com Asante Kotoko 
Asante Kotoko head coach David Duncan has revealed that he suspects a foul play in their loss to AshantiGold in the Otumfuo Cup played last month. 
The Ghana league champions climaxed their season with a 3-1 win over the Porcupine Warriors at the Baba Yara Sports Stadium to run away with the coveted Otumfuo Cup. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
